      • getOppositeNodes

        public java.util.List<VisualNode> getOppositeNodes(boolean ofIncomingEdges)
        Returns a list of the opposite nodes of the node's incoming/outgoing edges.
        Parameters:
        ofIncomingEdges - False for outgoing edges
        Returns:
        Opposite nodes of incoming edges if ofIncomingEdges is true or of outgoing edges if ofIncomingEdges is false.
